original_title: Israel launches attack on Gaza City — RT World News
article_summary: US imposes sanctions on ICC officials for pursuing cases against American soldiers and Israeli officials, including Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu. The ICC, which is not a party to the US or Israel, condemns the sanctions as an attack on its independence. Meanwhile, a Ukrainian man is arrested in Germany for suspected involvement in the bombing of the Nord Stream gas pipelines. In Israel, Prime Minister Netanyahu orders a military operation to take over Gaza City.</s>
